summary.span: 表示列印系統硬體或軟體元件的屬性 (及其屬性的值)。

span.span: Represents a property (and the value of the property) of a printing system hardware or software component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個類別來探索在執行階段的屬性和類型的列印系統物件，這些屬性，而不使用反映。The following example shows how to use this class to discover at run time the properties, and the types of those properties, of a print system object, without using reflection. [!code-csharp[GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection#ShowPropertyTypesWithoutReflection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection/CSharp/Program.cs#showpropertytypeswithoutreflection)] [!code-vb[GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection#ShowPropertyTypesWithoutReflection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection/visualbasic/program.vb#showpropertytypeswithoutreflection)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`應該使用的拼字和列印系統物件，包括大小寫的某些特定屬性的名稱完全相同。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，屬性物件必須使用的拼字"QueuePort 」、 不"PrintPort 」、 「 連接埠 」 或 「 Queueport"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "QueuePort", not "PrintPort", "Port", or "Queueport".

summary.span: 釋放 正在使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並且可選擇釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are being used by the and optionally releases the managed resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法未命名的布林參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`參數設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the parameter set to `false`. 布林值參數時`true`，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
